If you have any questions, requests or need help, you can always turn to them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4936,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/477af54b-1aaf-4ca3-a02d-c8a57aaa5952/hr contact.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/477af54b-1aaf-4ca3-a02d-c8a57aaa5952/hr contact.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hr contact.PNG\",\"name\":\"hr contact.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"wildcardType\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"477af54b-1aaf-4ca3-a02d-c8a57aaa5952\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":700,\"height\":45},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HR Contact is a member of your local People Management team, who will help you get settled at EPAM. You are assigned an HR Contact from your first day with us. On your Onboarding Portal, you can always see who your HR Contact is and quickly connect with them through the “PEOPLE WHO MAY HELP” section. You may contact them with any questions you have related to your employment with EPAM, except for those related to your project. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For general questions to the People Team, please use the following email address: A Buddy helps you to acclimate to EPAM’s (or the customer's) culture and workplace.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please find more details on our\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/UBSADMA/Buddy+Program\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" KB page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" dedicated to it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1525,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f121241a-716f-48a4-ade4-26e2bcc97bc6/mentor.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f121241a-716f-48a4-ade4-26e2bcc97bc6/mentor.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"mentor.png\",\"name\":\"mentor.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f121241a-716f-48a4-ade4-26e2bcc97bc6\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":701,\"height\":48},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we have many mentoring programs aimed at teaching basic primary skills or new technologies. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentor is a person who has a wealth of knowledge and experience in the professional area, motivated to spend personal time for knowledge transfer.
